headline: Spotlight on Citigroup: A Look at Wednesday’s Four Most Unusually Active Put Options
summary: Citigroup had four unusually active put options on Wednesday. While the risk/reward of selling any of the three puts expiring in nine days is attractive, the one expiring in nearly a year might be a better bet for risk-tolerant investors.

raw.headline: Spotlight on Citigroup: A Look at Wednesday’s Four Most Unusually Active Put Options
raw.summary: Citigroup had four unusually active put options on Wednesday. While the risk/reward of selling any of the three puts expiring in nine days is attractive, the one expiring in nearly a year might be a better bet for risk-tolerant investors.

headline: Citigroup's NII Rises Y/Y in 1H25: Will This Momentum Continue?
summary: C raises the 2025 NII outlook as 1H 2025 income jumps 8% on improved loan demand and favorable spreads.

raw.headline: Citigroup's NII Rises Y/Y in 1H25: Will This Momentum Continue?

headline: Trump’s Tariff May Cut India GDP by 1%, Analysts Say
summary: (Bloomberg) -- US President Donald Trump’s additional tariffs on India will further damage the South Asian nation’s already slowing economy and shrink its gross domestic product by as much as 1%, analysts said. headline: Davis Financial Fund 2025 Semi-Annual Review
summary: Davis Financial Fund returned +13.77% in the first half of 2025, exceeding the performance of the S&P Financials Index which returned +9.23%, and the S&P 500 Index, which returned +6.20%.

headline: FNCL: Quality Diversified U.S. Financials Exposure
summary: Fidelity MSCI Financials Index ETF thrives on U.S. Financials exposure but trades at high valuations. See more analysis on FNCL ETF here.
